channel.title: Help me please - programs are messed up
channel.description: Alright I have a severe comp problem. All the programs on my comp are opening in notepad cause this one kid put some kind program and then he was teamviewing and I was letting him do everything and he selected always open .exe with notepad or something. I need to fix this or atleast get system restore working but system restore opens in notepad. Help me please!!

item.title: Help me please - programs are messed up
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

ranger squad:

Surely notepad.exe would open in notepad.exe which would open in notepad.exe which would open in notepad.exe which would open in notepad.exe which would open in notepad.exe which would open in notepad.exe which would open in notepad.exe which would open in notepad.exe which would open in notepad.exe which IS A PARADOX. I think.

False. notepad.exe would open in OS!

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please - programs are messed up
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I ended up fixing. I was able to go into safe mode and for some reason system restore insafe mode wasn’t in notepad so I could run it. Reset my comp back 4 days.
